name: Kaagaz
headline: 'Office' Suite for Mobile-first Businesses in India
description:
Kaagaz is an 'Office' Suite for Mobile-first Businesses in India. With Kaagaz, these users can manage all the document requirements for their business using their smartphone itself, without needing a Desktop.

We have an active user base of 3Mn+ users and paid users north of 60,000+ - growing every month.

With over 200M such businesses in India, at $15/year subscription price, this a $3B opportunity in India & much larger globally.

We are a team of 2nd time entrepreneurs having scaled the pervious startup to $1M in GMV. We are backed by YCombinator, Goodwater Capital, Pravega Venture, Better Capital & other investors including Alan Rutledge (TrendMD) and Farid Ahsan (Sharechat)

founders.name: Snehanshu Gandhi, Founder
founders.description: 3X Entrepreneur. Engineer (IIT Bombay). MBA (ISB Hyderabad). Enjoy transforming ideas into Products. Building for Bharat.

founders.name: Tamanjit Bindra, Founder
founders.description: Tech co-founder who is learning the art of selling. Love B2C and scale (at which everything breaks). Thinks in Java, codes in everything. Backend developer.

founders.name: Gaurav Shrishrimal, Founder
founders.description:
2nd time Founder
Looks after Growth & Marketing at Kaagaz

generated_description:
### Kaagaz: Revolutionizing Document Management for Mobile-First Businesses in India

Founded in **2019**, Kaagaz stands out as an innovative 'Office' suite designed specifically for mobile-first businesses in India. The mission is straightforward: empower users to handle all document-related tasks directly from their smartphones, eliminating the need for cumbersome desktop setups.

#### Growing User Base and Market Potential

With an active user base exceeding **3 million** and over **60,000 paid subscribers**, Kaagaz is on a robust growth trajectory. The app caters to the vast landscape of **200 million businesses in India**, setting the stage for a lucrative market opportunity valued at **$3 billion**, which only scratches the surface when considering global growth.

#### A Solid Founding Team and Support

The founders of Kaagaz are second-time entrepreneurs who previously scaled their last startup to a notable **$1 million in GMV**. Their experience is amplified by backing from prominent investors, including **Y Combinator** and **Goodwater Capital**, along with notable figures like **Pravega Venture**, **Better Capital**, **Alan Rutledge**, and **Farid Ahsan**.

#### Comprehensive Features of the Kaagaz App

Kaagaz is essentially a Swiss Army knife for document management. Here’s what it brings to the table:

- **Document Scanner**: Quickly captures and converts images into PDFs.
- **PDF Reader & Editor**: Edit, merge, split, and enhance PDF documents without extra software.
- **Document Manager**: Organize files effortlessly, using folders for easy access.
- **Cloud Storage**: Securely back up documents with end-to-end encryption on Indian servers.
- **Offline Capabilities**: Work without internet connectivity, ensuring data security by keeping documents local unless explicitly saved to the cloud.

What's particularly appealing is that Kaagaz is built with the Indian user in mind, supporting **eight languages** and being completely free of unwanted watermarks. Users even have the option to impose their own custom watermarks, providing a seamless experience without ads.

#### Impactful Reception

The reception has been overwhelmingly positive, with users hailing the app's speed, ease of use, and effectiveness. Testimonials highlight the app's capability to streamline document management, making it a favorite among students and professionals alike.

### Conclusion

In summary, Kaagaz is carving out a significant niche in the document management space by addressing the unique needs of mobile-first businesses in India. With a vibrant user base and a strong foundation to support future expansion, Kaagaz is well-positioned to become an indispensable tool for millions of users in India and beyond. 

To join the Kaagaz revolution, visit their website at [Kaagaz.app](https://kaagaz.app).
